48.eng-name: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: Anas reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) visited a person from amongst his Companions who had grown as feeble as the chicken. The rest of the hadith is the same, but with this variation that he (the Holy Prophet) said:You have not power enough to undergo the torment imposed by Allah. And there is no mention of: He supplicated Allah for him and He cured him

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ الدُّعَاءِ بِتَعْجِيلِ الْعُقُوبَةِ فِي الدُّنْيَا
chapter.eng-name: It Is Disliked To Pray For Punishment To Be Brought Forward In This World
